# VR Profiles

Viewer Profile Generator: https://vr.google.com/cardboard/viewerprofilegenerator/
URL for phone: https://goo.gl/6tWJAX or [QR](data:image/gif;base64,)

Data URIs - HTTP | MDN (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/Data_URIs)

QR Decoder: https://zxing.org/

VR Profile decoder: http://vrembed.org/tools/google_profile_decode.html
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/36815427/cardboard-qr-decode

Enter input parameters - Cardboard Manufacturer Help (https://support.google.com/cardboard/manufacturers/answer/6323710)
>MAGNET - A Google Cardboard-like magnetic input. We no longer recommend magnet based inputs as they tend to work less reliably than e.g. conductive or capacitive inputs due to magnetometer variance within smartphones. Moving forward, we will not be certifying or featuring viewers with magnet inputs and support within future versions of Cardboard apps will be limited.

VR Headset QR Codes – (http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/)

## Viewer Profile Generator

Viewer Profile Generator: https://vr.google.com/cardboard/viewerprofilegenerator/

### parameters

    Primary button type [None Magnet Touch Indirect Touch]
    Screen to lens distance (mm) 
    Inter-lens distance (mm)
    Screen vertical alignment (Bottom Center Top)
    Tray to lens-center distance (mm)
    Distortion coefficients:
    k1 
    k2 
    Field-of-view angles:
    Outer (°) 
    Inner (°) 
    Top (°) 
    Bottom (°) 
    Viewer contains some embedded magnets (smartphone’s magnetometer should not be used)
